directions: Blend tomatoes, red onion, and serrano chile pepper in a blender until smooth; add cilantro, lime juice, garlic, vinegar, and salt; blend. Slowly pour olive oil into mixture while the blender is running. Continue blending for 10 more seconds.
ingredients: 1 serrano chile pepper, seeded and diced
1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
1 teaspoon red wine vinegar, or to taste
title: Pica De Gallo Inspired Gazpacho (Gluten-Free)
